Oh!\! Looks like someone else is here!
"I'm on a world tour learning new cooking techniques! Be back in a few months!"
Looks like all the lights are off.\! Bessie must be fast asleep!
This is the East side of town!
The building to the East is a bathhouse.
It's been under renovations for a while now but honestly, we have our own.\! So it doesn't matter.
What about that house over there?
Bessie lives there.\! She's a reknowned chef but she's always off traveling.\! I don't
She's missed in our poker nights~
Maybe someday I can come back here and check these places out!
Yeah if you have the unfortunate accident of meeting Bessie, she'll talk your ear off.
I like hanging out on the beach.\! The sound of waves makes me forget I have homework.
I take care of Bessie's house while she travels.\! She tells me she's coming back soon but...\!
She's been saying that for months now.\! Either way you should definitely meet her when
she comes back!\! Bessie would probably cook a nice hearty meal for ya!
You and Bessie have very similar "fashion" tastes.\! I'm sure you'd get along just fine!
The girl is joyfully swinging about!
Sigh...\! Could really use a dip in the bathouse right about now.
Talk to me once you've met Bessie.\! I'll give you items to unlock all her events.\! I will be gone in future
I am here only for this and next update to allow patrons to test all the Bessie scenes!\! I recommend
you buy the books after you have met Bessie!
I think the night makes the ocean extremely mysterious.
Haven't you noticed that when you're relaxed it's like you could take on the world?\! If this was an
RPG it would be like you get bonus stats!
If you want someone to like you more, make sure you find out things they like so you can
People kinda tuck in early in this town...\! There's defintiely more things to do during the
day, but there's fun to be had at night too!
